sentences.english: These towns already host hundreds of IDPs.
sentences.chinese: 这些城镇现已收容了数百名国内流离失所者。

sentences.english: Some years I chaos, in short, is displaced, around rock.
sentences.chinese: 我的岁月有些乱，总之，就是颠沛流离，四处晃荡。

sentences.english: They were dusted out last winter.
sentences.chinese: 去年冬天他们由于尘暴而流离失所。

sentences.english: They are not  displaced, but they are poor.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有流离失所，但是他们很穷。

sentences.english: The seeded answers quickly got displaced by write-ins.
sentences.chinese: 答案很快就在种子流离失所写插件。

sentences.english: Time is a great thing, can let fate displaced within Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 浛羭时间真是个伟大的东西啊，可以让命运颠沛流离。

sentences.english: I wanted to use a displaced life to forget all.
sentences.chinese: 我想过用一场颠沛流离的生活来遗忘所有。

sentences.english: Sick and starving refugees are the flotsam and jetsam of war.
sentences.chinese: 生病和饥饿的难民是遭战祸而流离失所的苦命人。

sentences.english: Yes, the government should help those who are displaced.
sentences.chinese: 是的，政府应该帮助那些流离失所的人。

sentences.english: So I chose to use the displaced living forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 所以选择用颠沛流离的生活来遗忘。

sentences.english: A prayer of Habakkuk the prophet upon Shigionoth.
sentences.chinese: 先知哈巴谷的祷告，调用流离歌。

sentences.english: No city is debating the displacement of residents more heatedly than Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 在芝加哥，关于流离失所的居民的争论正在白热化。

sentences.english: The remainder, referred to as displaced persons, or DPs, were people who literally had no place to go.
sentences.chinese: 其余被称为流离失所的人是那些完全走投无路的难民。

sentences.english: Since World War II, the Middle East region has been plagued by incessant wars and conflicts. Numerous lives have been lost and many innocent people displaced.
sentences.chinese: 二战以来，中东战火不断，生灵涂炭，百姓流离失所。

sentences.english: Separate mixing with variable displacement, volumetric pump.
sentences.chinese: 单独的混合变流离失所，容积泵。

sentences.english: So were internally displaced and stateless people.
sentences.chinese: 在国内流离失所的人和无国籍的人士也是调查的对象。
